verses.roman:
vāme-'vipra-śāsana' nārikela-vana
ḍāhine ta' puṣpodyāna yena vṛndāvana

synonyms: vāme—on the left; vipra-śāsana—the place known as vipra-śāsana; nārikela-vana—coconut grove; ḍāhine—on the right side; ta'-indeed; puṣpa-udyāna—flower gardens; yena—as if; vṛndāvana—Vṛndāvana.
translation: On the left side, Lord Jagannātha saw the neighborhood of brāhmaṇas known as vipra-śāsana and the coconut tree grove. On the right side, He saw nice flower gardens resembling those in the holy place Vṛndāvana.

purport.content: Vipra-śāsana is a name generally used in the Orissa province for the quarters where brāhmaṇas live.
